data.lyric:
[ti:Girl Like You]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:Rearview Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Girl Like You - Jason Aldean (杰森·阿尔丁)
[00:07.80]Written by：Michael Tyler/Jaron Boyer/Josh Mirenda
[00:15.61]Love how you close your eyes when I pull you in closer
[00:19.05]
[00:22.20]Tonight's moving fast but we ain't taking it slower
[00:25.67]
[00:28.09]You hit me harder than a drink does
[00:30.55]
[00:31.37]You're gonna take me all the way up
[00:33.52]
[00:35.04]Something about you baby got me going crazy
[00:38.12]
[00:38.83]I don't know what to do
[00:40.75]I've never met a girl like you
[00:43.81]That's ever done it quite like you do
[00:46.68]
[00:48.16]Your kiss is double barrel bourbon on rocks
[00:51.65]Your lips are just the cherry on top
[00:54.27]I've never been high like this
[00:57.23]Turn out the lights and let me breathe you in
[01:00.20]
[01:01.61]Your eyes are so diamond body so gold
[01:05.03]And I don't want to let you go
[01:07.57]I've never met a girl like you
[01:12.04]
[01:22.23]Love how you say my name and make it sound so sexy
[01:25.56]
[01:28.72]Love how you do that thing yeah you know what gets me
[01:32.36]
[01:34.28]I'm talking slow motion all night long
[01:36.91]
[01:38.28]Baby love you with the lights on
[01:40.29]
[01:41.00]I've never met a girl like you
[01:43.86]That's ever done it quite like you do
[01:46.74]
[01:48.33]Your kiss is double barrel bourbon on rocks
[01:51.60]Your lips are just the cherry on top
[01:54.34]I've never been high like this
[01:57.03]Turn out the lights and let me breathe you in
[02:00.18]
[02:01.62]Your eyes are so diamond body so gold
[02:04.96]And I don't want to let you go
[02:07.56]I've never met a girl like you
[02:12.13]
[02:21.05]I've never met a girl like you
[02:23.59]
[02:27.71]I've never met a girl like you
[02:30.45]That's ever done it quite like you do
[02:33.68]
[02:34.98]Your kiss is double barrel bourbon on rocks
[02:38.23]Your lips are just the cherry on top
[02:40.87]I've never been high like this
[02:43.65]Turn out the lights and let me breathe you in
[02:46.98]
[02:48.11]Your eyes are so diamond body so gold
[02:51.72]And I don't want to let you go
[02:54.26]I've never met a girl like you
[02:58.72]
[03:00.93]I've never met a girl like you
data.trans:
[ti:Girl Like You]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:Rearview Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.80]//
[00:15.61]当我把你拉近身边 你静静闭上双眼的模样真是迷人
[00:19.05]
[00:22.20]今晚过得好快 但我们不愿放慢脚步
[00:25.67]
[00:28.09]你让我神魂颠倒 比烈酒更醉人
[00:30.55]
[00:31.37]你让我感觉飞上了天堂
[00:33.52]
[00:35.04]宝贝 你真是让我不能自已
[00:38.12]
[00:38.83]我不知道该怎么办
[00:40.75]我从未遇到过你这样的女孩
[00:43.81]没人像你一样让我痴迷
[00:46.68]
[00:48.16]你的吻就像加冰的波旁威士忌
[00:51.65]你的唇就像杯子上樱桃
[00:54.27]我从未如此开心
[00:57.23]把灯关掉 让我感受你的呼吸
[01:00.20]
[01:01.61]你的眼睛就像钻石一般闪耀 身体就像金子一般完美
[01:05.03]我不想放开你
[01:07.57]我从未遇到过你这样的女孩
[01:12.04]
[01:22.23]你呼唤我名字的声音真是撩人
[01:25.56]
[01:28.72]你的手段那么纯熟 仿佛能猜透我的心
[01:32.36]
[01:34.28]我要彻夜不眠 在你耳边说尽甜言蜜语
[01:36.91]
[01:38.28]宝贝 我喜欢灯光映照下的你
[01:40.29]
[01:41.00]我从未遇到过你这样的女孩
[01:43.86]没人像你一样让我痴迷
[01:46.74]
[01:48.33]你的吻就像加冰的波旁威士忌
[01:51.60]你的唇就像杯子上樱桃
[01:54.34]我从未如此开心
[01:57.03]把灯关掉 让我感受你的呼吸
